metadata.name: Remote Access Tool - NetSupport Execution From Unusual Location
metadata.comment: Detects execution of client32.exe (NetSupport RAT) from an unusual location (outside of 'C:\Program Files')

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\client32.exe')) AND contains(lower(metadata.product.name), lower('netsupport remote control')) AND contains(lower(process.file.name), lower('client32.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('imphash=a9d50692e95b79723f3e76fcf70d023e')) AND NOT (startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\program files\\')) OR startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\program files (x86)\\'))))

output.summary: Detects execution of client32.exe (NetSupport RAT) from an unusual location (outside of 'C:\Program Files')
